channel.title: My other Account, needs mod to accept validation
channel.description:
Ok, my other account is called 'The Real Java' but i changed my email And my password at the same time, then it told me to accept a validation...it didn't come for a day so i tryed to send another, still didn't work...i have checked all the email adresses i used on this account and no email...i tryed to log in and it says send another so i did...still nothing..
Then i pressed 'Forgot password?' and it came up with "You need to activate you're account first" so i clicked "Click HERE for another validation email" and i still havn't got it...it's starting to piss me off now because my other account had 9 rep ( what i think is good ) and about 250 posts... :(
Thanks
~The Real Java~
